[Global Namespace]::​File
class File {...}

File class.

Is used to read from/write to files in disk.

Functions
IsOpen
bool IsOpen() const

Returns whether the file was successfully opened.

Close
void Close()

Closes the file if it is open.

Remove
void Remove()

Removes the file. The file must be open, and you must have write access.

GetSize
size_t GetSize() const

Returns the size of the file.

Tell
size_t Tell() const

Tells the position of the read/write pointer.

Seek
size_t Seek(
const size_t uiPosition,
const SeekFileFlags_t uiSeekMode
)

Sets the read/write pointer to a new position. Returns the new position within the file.

EOFReached
bool EOFReached() const

Returns whether end of file was reached.

ReadCharacter
string ReadCharacter()

Reads a single character.

ReadLine
void ReadLine(
string& out szOutLine,
const string& in szDelim = '\n'
)

Reads a line from the file.

Read
bool Read(
BLOB@ pBlob,
size_t uiSizeInBytes
)

Reads a number of bytes into the given BLOB.

Read
bool Read(
BLOB@ pBlob
)

Reads as much as possible data into the given BLOB.

ReadBlob
BLOB@ ReadBlob(
size_t uiSizeInBytes,
bool fCanResize = true
)

Reads a number of bytes into a BLOB.

ReadBlob
BLOB@ ReadBlob()

Reads as much as possible data into a BLOB.

Write
void Write(
const string& in szString
)

Writes a string to the file.

Write
void Write(
const BLOB@ pBlob
)

Writes a blob to the file.
